sailpoint.web.certification
Class CertificationBean

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.web.PageCodeBase
      sailpoint.web.BaseBean
          sailpoint.web.BaseObjectBean<Certification>
              sailpoint.web.certification.CertificationBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, sailpoint.web.UserContext, sailpoint.web.util.NavigationHistory.Page
public class CertificationBean
extends sailpoint.web.BaseObjectBean<Certification>
implements sailpoint.web.util.NavigationHistory.Page

A JSF UI bean which is used for a user to certify to entitlements.

CertificationBean

@Deprecated
public CertificationBean()
                  throws GeneralException
Deprecated. Instead use CertificationBean.CertificationBean(Certification, CertificationEntity, SaveListener, String). The default constructor should only be used when JSF auto-creates the bean because certain request parameters are expected.

Default constructor.

Throws:
GeneralException

CertificationBean

public CertificationBean(Certification cert,
                         CertificationEntity identity,
                         CertificationBean.SaveListener listener,
                         java.lang.String workItemId)
                  throws GeneralException
Constructor to edit an CertificationIdentity.

Parameters:
cert - The Certification that the identity is a part of.
identity - The CertificationIdentity to be edited.
listener - The SaveListener to notify when the certification is saved.
workItemId - The ID of the work item in which this certification is being edited.
Throws:
GeneralException
Method Detail

viewCertification

public static void viewCertification(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context,
                                     java.lang.String certId)
This stores information in the session so that after redirecting, the CertificationBean will have the information it needs. This also clears the filter on the CertificationIdentitiesListBean.

Parameters:
context - The FacesContext to use.
certId - The ID of the certification is about to be viewed.

viewCertification

public static void viewCertification(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context,
                                     java.lang.String certId,
                                     boolean resetFilter)
This stores information in the session so that after redirecting, the CertificationBean will have the information it needs. This also clears the filter on the CertificationIdentitiesListBean if resetFilter is true.

Parameters:
context - The FacesContext to use.
certId - The ID of the certification is about to be viewed.
resetFilter - Whether to reset the filter or not.

getDaysRemaining

public int getDaysRemaining()
                     throws GeneralException
Return the number of days left to complete this certification. If the certification does not have an expiration date, this returns Integer.MIN_VALUE.

Returns:
The number of days left to complete this certification, or Integer.MIN_VALUE if the certification does not have an expiration date.

isListEntities

public boolean isListEntities()
                       throws GeneralException
True if preferences stored on the logged in identity are set to show list entities view, or the certification definition is configured to default to list entities, or the global certification config is configured to show list entities by default. The checks are done in that order.

Returns:
true if list entities view should be shown

GeneralException

isProcessRevokesImmediately

public boolean isProcessRevokesImmediately()
                                    throws GeneralException
Indicates that remediations (revokes or approves with provisioning) will be executed immediately after the decision is made. As a result, the decision radios will lock once a decision is made.

Returns:
true if the certification is configured to process revokes immediately
Throws:
GeneralException

isAllowExceptionPopup

public boolean isAllowExceptionPopup()
                              throws GeneralException
Enables certifiers to view the allow exception pop-up and manually set expiration dates and add comments. This applies to both violation and non-violation items.

This can only be set on the definition. There is no system config option for this.

Returns:
True if the certification is configured to allow setting exception pop-up
Throws:
GeneralException

isAllowCreatingRolesFromCertification

public boolean isAllowCreatingRolesFromCertification()
                                              throws GeneralException
Returns true if roles can be created from the certification items in the current certification. This excludes non-identity certifications. Business role membership certifications are also excluded because while they deal with identities they do not include additional entitlements.

Returns:
True if roles can be created from certification items.
Throws:
GeneralException

getCheckDisplayDetailedViewFilterSet

public boolean getCheckDisplayDetailedViewFilterSet()
                                             throws GeneralException
This controls the switch from the list to detailed view according to user preferences. To do the switch, it Checks and sets up the detailed view with implied filter and automatically selects the first identity as per the implied filter. Continues retaining the Implied filter unless filter is explicitly changed. Explicit changes could happen.

Throws:
GeneralException

saveAndRefreshCertification

public static boolean saveAndRefreshCertification(Certification cert,
                                                  SailPointContext ctx,
                                                  sailpoint.web.BaseBean bean)
                                           throws GeneralException
Save the given certification and refresh it with the Certificationer, storing any errors encountered in the given bean.

Parameters:
cert - The Certification to save and refresh.
ctx - The SailPointContext to use.
bean - The JSF bean into which errors will be saved.
Returns:
True if there were no errors, false otherwise.
Throws:
GeneralException
